main event: Observers in Philadelphia reported seeing a bright, round, whitish-green light in the sky which seemed to split into two objects and moved in an erratic zig-zag manner.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The light was initially thought to be a star before it was observed moving,The light suddenly accelerated and vanished from view, observed from a car at night,The incident was reported to the Air Force and investigated under Project Blue Book.
sighted object: bright, star-like light in the sky
witness description: The witnesses were passengers in a car observing the light.
